name: Malicious Mansion
description:
=============================================================

Final project for Intro to Video Game Design.

Made in approximately 50 hours total.

=============================================================

CONTROLS

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

LShift - Attack

=============================================================

+ Pixel Art Side Scroller Pack  by MARTA MAKSYMIEC

+ Simple Small Pixel Hearts by C.Nilsson

+ Free Pixel Mobs by David Henry

+ Sounds by Danny La 

+ Voice Acting by Maxime Pichel

+   2D Platformer Course Tutorial by James Doyle
